tool_description: An API service to obtain HOT posts of Leetcode Discuss Compensation
name: Leetcode Compensation
title: Leetcode Compensation

api_list.name: Get Information of a particular post
api_list.description: This API Endpoint will return information of a particular post with specific postID.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://leetcode-compensation.p.rapidapi.com/posts/2796025"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "leetcode-compensation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://leetcode-compensation.p.rapidapi.com/posts/{postid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "leetcode-compensation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get HOT posts of Leetcode Discuss Compensation
api_list.description: This API Endpoint will return 150 HOT posts of Leetcode Discuss Compensation.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://leetcode-compensation.p.rapidapi.com/posts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "leetcode-compensation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://leetcode-compensation.p.rapidapi.com/posts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "leetcode-compensation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
